info.name: Glow Elearn Project
info.description: This collection is a continuation of the universal school system collection.

item.name: Reset Password

request.description: This endpoint should be used by the administrators of the platform as the first stage of resetting their password, where a reset token is sent to their mobile phone as a text message.

This is the final stage in the password reset process, where an administrator of the platform's software sends the recieved reset token along with his new password and a confirmation of the new password.
This endpoint should be used by the parents registered on the platform as the first stage of resetting their password, where a reset token is sent to their mobile phone as a text message.

This is the final stage in the password reset process, where an administrator of the platform's software sends the recieved reset token along with his new password and a confirmation of the new password.

This endpoint should be used by the staff officials of schools registered on the platform as the first stage of resetting their password, where a reset token is sent to their mobile phone as a text message.

This is the final stage in the password reset process, where a school's staff official registered on the platform sends the recieved reset token along with his new password and a confirmation of the new password.
This endpoint should be used by the students of schools registered on the platform as the first stage of resetting their password, where a reset token is sent to their mobile phone as a text message.

This is the final stage in the password reset process, where a school's student registered on the platform sends the recieved reset token along with his new password and a confirmation of the new password.

item.description:
This folder contains the endpoints needed for resetting the password of any user who has forgotten their password.
The user must first make a post request to the forgot password route with their phone number.
They will recieve a code in a text message.
They must send that code, their new password and a confirmation of that new password in a patch request to the reset password route.
If the code is vaild and it's time limit has not expired, the user's password will be successfully reset and the user will be logged in automatically.

request.description: This creates a book for a specific school
This retrieves all the books for a school
This retrieves a single book belonging to a specific school
This updates a single book belonging to a specific school
This deletes a book belonging to a specific school

item.description: This folder consists of endpoints relating to performing read update and delete operations for students of specific schools.

request.description: Use this endpoint to delete the staff of a school.

item.description: This folder consits of a series of endpoints, which allow's a school's administrator to perform read update and delete operations on his staff information.

item.name: Parents

request.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve the information of parents that have children who are students of a specific school.
